name: QuadraBust
description:
This is a little project I've been working on that turned out pretty well.

You control a character like a platformer, and have to shoot the blocks, if they match (3 of the same color touch) you can destroy more then one at a time.

-Controls-
Arrows = Left/Right
Z = fly
X = shoot

-FREE-
The game is free, but I added  a suggested price of $1.00.
The money I get from this game will be the main motivating factors on if I continue to improve it, make any sequels, or do any games like it.
